desc: Clearsips is a family-owned business dedicated to bringing Canadians great-tasting non-alcoholic drinks to enjoy on any occasion. With over 20 years of experience in the wine and spirits industry, Clearsips is excited to show you our handpicked selection of non-alcoholic wine, spirits, beer, and pre-mixed drinks.

layout.text: We highly recommend you keep a few of these tall boys frosted and ready to go at all times this summer. You and your friends won’t be disappointed.
